comment: His projects and homework is very easy. His grading is quite generous as well. Because of the time that's limited in class, some design examples he goes over too fast, so make sure you watch a quick tutorial on youtube or something or else you wont know how to do it later on.

This is the nicest man ever. Don't be afraid to ask him for help though, because he'll keep going through his lecture. If you do work, you'll make an A. Just have fun with the class because you'll cry more next semester with those classes.
Been a great EDG professor, hope you get well soon if you're reading this, Mr. Berger

He’s a solid choice. The first few weeks have a lot of homework, but once you get into solid works, the difficulty drops. He gave us our quizzes before we actually took it so you knew everything that was going to be asked. He 3-d prints one of your projects and you get to keep it. I honestly don’t know why he isn’t rated better.

Students who were new to CAD programs found the class to be terrible but if you have experience with any CAD, you'll be fine. The department's 1211 curriculum has been standardized since the most recent reviews so anything about content doesn't apply. Many said he did not teach the material well and he was not super engaged.

The first few of weeks are hard, but after you learn to use SolidWorks more, it gets easier. Class is sometimes working on homework in class or following along with the rest of the class to model a part. Unlike alot of teachers, there is room to do things in a different way that he doesn't teach. As long as you make your models to scale, it's good.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Accessible outside class

comment: Terrible. Doesn't know how to teach/barely teaches. The work wasn't very hard though. Gave a midterm with content that we hadn't been taught yet (but not hard to figure out), and accused students of cheating when they did it right.

The class was extremely hard for being just a freshman. I practically had to learn everything off YouTube because he wasnt very detailed & moves fast . He takes off points for simple little things , gives extreme homework to do in a week & overall would pick another teacher if I was you.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Accessible outside class--Tough grader
